com.foreach.across.modules.spring.security.acl.services

Interface AclSecurityService

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    QueryableAclSecurityService
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AclSecurityServiceImpl

    public interface AclSecurityService
    Provides easy access to ACL related services and checking.
    Author:
    Arne Vandamme
